website_summaries.verdict: Well-made, tall, and even fits curvy calves. If you don't like the fashion-forward look of booties, then go with this classic style.
pros: Full-length vertical overlays topped with pull-tabs and chunky stacked heel.Elasticized gore at back cuff

customer_reviews.title: but I'm happy with my product
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely thrilled with these boots my husband got for me. The color is a pinch darker than the picture shows, I chose Honey. My box says Honey Cornelian, not sure if that means its a different color or not, but I'm happy with my product. I believe the description "honey" was just a shortened title. I'm 5 foot 4 inches, around 110lbs and on the slim side... Boots aren't too tight or too loose... VERSITILE... I want to sell all my subpar boots and save up for more of these! Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed S.

customer_reviews.title: I recently had the heals resoled (i have a tendency to drag my heals when I walk) and chose to do that instead of buying new boots because the fit is perfect and the leather gets better with age
customer_reviews.text: Two years Fall/Winters later and these are still my go-to's! I recently had the heals resoled (i have a tendency to drag my heals when I walk) and chose to do that instead of buying new boots because the fit is perfect and the leather gets better with age. Classic design means they will be worn for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: HSell14

customer_reviews.title: A Great Western  Style Boot
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for this boot all winter. it is exactly what I wanted the right height not too tight on my calves and very delicate pebbled texture on the leather. I really wanted something a bit lighter in a cream color. However, these are great. I would recommend these to anyone especially for the price real leather! The only negative is that they don't have a zipper so I had to put them on very slowly. I wouldn't recommend them to anyone with a high instep otherwise its all good.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels L.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I own these boots in Bourbon and they are lovely, sturdy, and comfortable. I recently purchased them in black, and the quality is completely inconsistent. The leather is thin, the shaft is floppy and slouchy, and I doubt they will hold up as the bourbon pair have. Disappointed with the quality of the black pair, love the bourbon pair.
customer_reviews.author: Slk710

customer_reviews.title: Soooo small!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are gorgeous, but they run incredibly small! I normally wear a 7 or 7 1/2, and I read that they ran small so I ordered an 8. They were so tiny I couldn't even get my foot into the boot! I wanted them for a trip I was going on, but there wasn't time to return and rebuy. And I also honestly couldn't figure out what size to buy--8 1/2? 9? 9 1/2? It seems ridiculous that I might have to purchase a boot a full two sizes larger than I normally wear. So, order them at least two sizes larger and maybe these beautiful boots will fit you.
customer_reviews.author: green

customer_reviews.title: Horrible color, not represented accurately here
customer_reviews.text: The honey color does not look like this! It is lacking in the warm orangey tone that is pictured here. My husband and I both had exactly the same reaction to the color--it looks like dog p**. Really awful color. And even though the ones I ordered are not wide calf, the width at the top of the boot is excessive, so they look awful on. And they're strangely tight in the heel. I SO wanted these to work out, since based on the picture they look exactly like boots I was trying to replace, but they're going back.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I really like these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. They are exactly the color I was looking for and I love that the style is somewhat plain and not a bunch of zippers, buckles and things. I am a size 7.5-8, but almost always buy 8 in boots for thicker socks. They have been no trouble breaking in and are pretty comfortable. My only complaint and I read other reviewers had this problem as well before I purchased them... They slouch around the ankles like they are too big or loose. I feel like I'm pulling them up a lot which is odd because they aren't loose on my calves at all. (I have 15 inch calves.) Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sigler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They're a little narrow in the ankles and I have small ankles, but I just love them. I wore them all fall and winter and they have held up great. I have been trying to find them in black. I hate boots with zippers and these are just perfect. Took me a long time to find them and a lot of research, I ended up seeing them on a girl at work and knew they were for me. I could not be happier with my purchase. If you like to wear thick boot socks you may want to get the wider legged option.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBuntin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots- the best!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous leather! Well worth price. Comparable to $300-400 boots. Nice color and quality. 7.5 M fit as expected but "calf portion" is ver wide but since they are so flattering and stand up well (quality leather no droop) I don't mind the wide calf cut. Very cushiony and comfortable ample toe box. I bought another pair of Lucky boots The quality and fit are so great!!!
customer_reviews.author: scooter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect brown color! These boots fit as expected. Slightly tight at first, but broke in within a few hours. I have large athletic calves (skinny jeans are like leggings on me) and these boots fit well. I don't think I will be able to wear them with jeans or thick socks though. Slightly slouchy in the ankle, but doesn't bother me. The color and texture of the leather is gorgeous. Similar to Frye.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: On trend and so cute -- no goofy wide-calf styling either !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just darling and so on trend -- and a great deal for this pair (I looked around -- there are so many styles just like this for Fall 2015 - at many times the price)... I got the "wide calf" (I have muscular calves which can sometimes - but often not - fit into a regular boot shaft -- but almost never would accommodate pants tucked in.) These are darling - don't look like they are "wide calf" (no gussets, stretch panels, elastic etc) -- and will allow me to tuck in jeans, jeggings, etc. Love 'em - and the textured leather and beautiful neutral warm tan color. Bring on the "boot weather !" :-)
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots however the ankle was way too big and slouchy...so had to return! Nice color if you are looking for lighter although not for everyone. My family thought they were ugly color! Lucky Hisbiscus boots are super comfortable but it seems they are produced differently as some fit really tight and others are very large and slouchier in the ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: T. Howard

customer_reviews.title: ... and after a couple of wears these broke in nicely. I also have a medium sized calf
customer_reviews.text: I have a foot on the wider side and after a couple of wears these broke in nicely. I also have a medium sized calf, lean but muscular, and these fit nicely snug. I can fit a pair of skinny jeans in them with a little room left. These boots look expensive and they are a nice medium brown color that match pretty much everything including black pants.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Order one size larger
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of these boots but they are really snug. I wear a size 9 and with thin socks on my feet were crying. I returned them and plan to order the next size up. They are stylish, excellent grain of leather and can be dressed up or down. Just remember to order one size larger, even when they stretch they will be snug
customer_reviews.author: Joan HF

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a week, and love them! Real leather, perfect round toe, great color! I have average size calves but these are tight, however, I can still wear skinny jeans under them. Looks great with jeans, dresses, or leggings. They are a little difficult to get on and off, but I assume they will get easier over time as the leather stretches a bit. Considering buying a pair in black, and the Amazon price can't be beat. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JenJK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots, I just happened to order the wrong size. I would definitely say ordering half a size up isn't a bad idea.. but more than that is probably over-kill. I have medium-wide feet, size 7 usually but will be ordering in a 7.5 for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: deidra

customer_reviews.title: Like Them, but don't love them....
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but the shaft is a bit narrow and the boot gets a bit slouchy at the ankle. If you have thin legs, the shaft would be fine but you might not like the slouchiness of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Morr

customer_reviews.title: I am rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots back in March, and I wore them for the first time last week. The strap broke off the first time I wore them, and I did not even pull hard on putting them on! I will try to glue the strap back on with Shoe Goo. Even thought I purchased the boots at a deep discount, I am rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nyctic

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are awesome boots. No zipper
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are awesome boots. No zipper, but they are wide enough for me. I would say I have larger than average calves. Really like them and am considering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed I could not exchange for correct size
customer_reviews.text: These boots are probable sized correctly but I had previously purchased the boots in black and had to go a half size smaller so I order these boots in that same size. This time the boots were too small. I rated three stars not based on the boots, but that I was unable to exchange for the correct size. I had to return and then try to repurchase. The half size larger cost significantly more so I returned and did not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots but to wide at the heel
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality leather and nice casual dressy look. The only problem was the fit around the heel. It was too large for my foot so I was not able to walk without my heel moving up. Too bad....
customer_reviews.author: Cyris J.

customer_reviews.title: Lucky brand love all their shoes!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots...leather and color are amazing. Can't wait till the fall to wear them. The boots need a little stretching in the ankle area. They are a little tight. I guess it will stretch once they are broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Sadness
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boots the moment they arrived. Had them for 2 days and went for a walk. After the walk I noticed that my boots were making a sound and it appears that something in the footbed of both boots broke and I hear this noise now every time I take a step. I did want to return them but Lucky and Amazon had no more stock in my size.
customer_reviews.author: SandWr

customer_reviews.title: A perfect boot that is great for the office and still ...
customer_reviews.text: A perfect boot that is great for the office and still casual for all the other times. I wanted a flat boot that I could wear to work without looking too dressed down and this does the trick. I need to put insoles in, they bottoms are pretty hard, but the fit is true to size. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: boots that are also very comfortable and so far this brand appears it will hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be well made. I chose these because I have another pair of Lucky B. boots that are also very comfortable and so far this brand appears it will hold up for many years.
customer_reviews.author: S. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Shaft Not Wide Shaft
customer_reviews.text: Calf way too small, these are not wide shaft boots. The calves were way to tight, these are not wide shaft boots. Disappointing, was hoping for more!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy_ann

customer_reviews.title: Little big, but great boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are high quality leather, the color looks exactly as pictured and the price was good. However, I ordered a 6.5 which normally fits, but had to exchange them for a 6. Definitely comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Branam

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship and boots looked used!
customer_reviews.text: One of the boots was not finished inside like the other, the part where your foot stands on inside the boot and the sitching was poorly done. Also my box was torn and taped back up. So when I opened the box and looked at the bottom of the shoe, they looked like they had been worn a few times. Very disappointed I had to return, but thankfully found some very nice INC leather riding boots from Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: R Bors

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are AWESOME! I am in love. I was worried the oxblood color would be too reddish / burgundy but it is beautiful -- a great reddish brown. The pebble grain is awesome.They honestly look to be better quality than FRYE boots! I got these for $85! Can't wait for FALL!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots. They are a bit narrow in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots. They are a bit narrow in the foot but they'll stretch out as I break them in so no worries. Fit perfectly with jeans in the calf. A little loose in the heel/ankle as other viewers have mentioned but it seems that's the only option without adding a zipper. Already getting lots of compliments. Great boot for the quality and so much less $ than Frye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It turned out to be fairly easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about putting them on because they don't have zippers. It turned out to be fairly easy to put on. They are a bit loose insider for me, but keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: HappyBunny

customer_reviews.title: They were very pretty though so sad I needed to return them
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6 and the 6.5 was too small. I think because the calf is narrow so it is hard to get a foot in the boot. They were very pretty though so sad I needed to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and good quality for the money. If you are in between sizes, order half size up. They are not narrow but do run more to the narrow side plus you wear socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: sporty mom

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great! But pull on boot might not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Leather, awesome. Breaking in nicely. I love Lucky for that. Look great, just what the pics represent. Maybe better. Only draw back is they are pull on rather than zipper. The ankle area is tight so there is a bit of struggle to get heel in past heel reinforcement. (I have 8/8.5 size so maybe better for tiny feet.) I have been using handy tabs on top...until they ripped off. Still really like them though. They were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots! I now have 2 pairs in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ouelletje8

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Very comfortable, no need to break them in. I'm very impressed with the Lucky brand boots, did not expect this great of quality from them. Second pair!
customer_reviews.author: StaceyC

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: loved these shoes when I first bought them, but after only a few wearings, the rubber/leather (?) on the heal started to peel away and every time I take a step, there sounds like little rocks in the sole - but I have no idea how they got in there (no obvious hole or entry point, just loose pebbles)
customer_reviews.author: Momof2princesses

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots. I can wear them dressed up or dressed down and they are very comfortable for me since I walk around a lot at work.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia D

customer_reviews.title: Run extremely small!
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. Tried two sizes and neither worked. Sizing up didn't help. I didn't feel comfortable sizing up a whole size so I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: In Love w/ These Boots!
customer_reviews.text: So in love with these boots. They even make my feet look smaller due to the shape. Super comfortable and I believe I will get a lot of use for years to come. They appear to be very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect in every way. They fit true to size, the leather is gorgeous, they are very comfortable. They can be dressed up or down. They are my new favorite boots!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots the leather is a great color (oxblood) ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots the leather is a great color (oxblood) I get lots of compliments on them - they are narrow in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: GMGAR

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots, I have two pair now and they hold up very well. I get a lot of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: dumpy looking
customer_reviews.text: The calves are way too large! I have somewhat large calves so I was shocked when these were too big in the leg. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Brewster Family

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality leather for the price. I got it for my sister and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Semmi Jang

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for petites
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have kept these. The leather is wonderful, a little stiff but would probably soften over time. The boot itself was comfortable with plenty of room for the toes. However, I am only 5'2" and these are just too tall and hit me in the back of the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me but Amazon returns at least let me try.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. Runs a little big and slouched in the ankle for me. I have a narrow foot and shinny legs. Returned them but loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Nana F

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots!!! They are everything I have been looking for in a boot. Just PERFECT! I am 5'8 150 lbs. I usually wear an 8.5 but every other boot I have had to get a 9. I got the 8.5 in oxblood and there is plenty of room for socks and jeans to tuck down in them.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: I love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look...but they are too big in the heel. I can't keep them on! Wish I didn't have to return them. Do they come in a narrow?
customer_reviews.author: M.C. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots were too large in the calf area, looked odd and I have bigger calves.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit and the look is very nice! I love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable. They aren't true wide calf for us wide calf women. Altho I can get the on...I still dont have enough room to tuck my jeans in them. They are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Campbell

customer_reviews.title: ... were too tight for me but the boots are beautiful! If only I had my dad's calves
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger calf so these were too tight for me but the boots are beautiful! If only I had my dad's calves!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: This is may second pair of these boots and I absolutely love them! The first pair I was able to wear for over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: T LaBere

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Brand Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased another pair of lucky brand boots and once more they exceed my expectations of comfort. This boot ,unbelievably easy to put on without a zipper.From 1-10 , I give this boot a10.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Bogard

customer_reviews.title: Not wide calf
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but thought I was purchsing them in wide calf so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots, but had to return too large all over!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 6.5, they were too big. I had to return, they were beautiful boots though.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Boots were lovely. Color was lovely. But they ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots were lovely. Color was lovely. But they arrived as wide calf although it wasn't in the item description- the box actually had the WC label. I returned them and bought from a different seller to get a regular calf width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't afford Frye Boots so these were a perfect substitute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like them
customer_reviews.text: It feels tight in the foot with thin socks. I don't think I could use them with winter socks. And they are too wide in the calves. I don't like how they look on, unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too small.. And I bought a half size larger than I usually wear. Bought the same boot a few years back @ Macy's, loved them. Literally wore them until they fell apart. These boots however, felt flimsy & poorly made.. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pedler

customer_reviews.title: If I wanted someone's old boots, I'd have went to a thrift store
customer_reviews.text: What a huge waste of time. These boots are used and worn and look horrible. Sending back RIGHT NOW.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Thornton

customer_reviews.title: great quality they fit just perfect and I recommend this ...
customer_reviews.text: great quality they fit just perfect and I recommend this boots to every women, the leather is very soft and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this purchase, since I love most of the Lucky brand clothing and jewelry that I have. I have never tried their footwear, however. When the boots came, they looked cheaply constructed and they did not look as stylish as they did in the picture. I always order a half size larger, because I have muscular calves, and the shafts of these boots barely fit over my calves and bagged unattractively around the ankle. They may work for people with smaller feet/legs, but I was also disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Day Mattson

customer_reviews.title: But I love them. Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: They're a little narrow in the calf. But I love them. Beautiful color, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bethlizzi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE these boots! The price was exceptional too!!!
customer_reviews.author: livinthemoment

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! I agree with some other buyers that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! I agree with some other buyers that the heel is sort of cheap, but I have no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit, color, and comfort of this boot. I wanted a really simple brown boot without any zippers or embellishments, and I found exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: louisaS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable boots. I wear them to work and my feet don't get tired of standing or running around in them.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: but I still love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I am a true size 8M, and these boots fit perfectly. I agree with other reviewers who say the ankle area is larger than preferable, but I still love the boots!
customer_reviews.author: abray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of tight around my very athletic calves but other than that, they were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Vickish1

customer_reviews.title: I am selling these on as postage return is exorbitant ...
customer_reviews.text: I am selling these on as postage return is exorbitant. Sizing was weird. I am a very standard size 8, but the shoe part was tight and then the calf was bizarrely baggy. Looked very strange.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Black

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were beautiful, but too small, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather but very narrow. 9 1/2 was too long and 9 was too narrow
customer_reviews.author: lisa henry

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them as I have a very high arch and couldn't get my foot in boot!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: I love my boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots! I have them in black too. The only reason I gave 4 stars..Im not to crazy about the pebbled leather.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne pagan

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Love the rich color!! Fit pretty close to what I expected. The heel is a little roomy but I have small heels. Not large enough to make me want to send them back!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Willingham

customer_reviews.title: and LOVE the colour
customer_reviews.text: I got these in Oxblood, and LOVE the colour. I could have definitely gone a size down from my usual 7, though, and they are quite large in the calf for me (mine are 13.5 inches). There is a bit of a weird bump where they get bigger into the calf, but since they are so thick they stay up well and look pretty good. A bit wide for me too, and they rub in the heel, but I think getting half a size down would have sorted that out. Thick socks, and these will be great winter boots.
customer_reviews.author: js99

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Too big and appeared worn. Sent back to exchange, though, very comfy and versatile boot.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These came too small. The toe part has a rubber grip that is hard to get socks through. I am returning these. I wear a size 6.5 and ordered a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Dew Bug

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are one my favorites!!! Fit great and so comfortable! Love... Love... Love...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful, but they do not fit me. Too wise in the shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Comfortable for walking -- size fits (7) - leather very nice. Great find!!
customer_reviews.author: Ktguzman

customer_reviews.title: 5 fit perfect. Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a size 8 and 7.5 fit perfect. Comfortable and warm. Great color and leather.
customer_reviews.author: janel lloyd

customer_reviews.title: The size fit perfect. They do need to be broken into due ...
customer_reviews.text: The size fit perfect. They do need to be broken into due to them being leather. But happy for sure. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect except they were not wide enough- big bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Missy W

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, very wide calf and loose heels.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were described as having a 14.5 inch opening (a relatively narrow calf) but what was actually shipped were very wide-calf boots. I suspect that either the measurements were just wrong, or the boot actually comes in a wide and regular calf version. As well, the heel is extremely loose, so that with every step my heel slipped out. These were the first boots I've had to return from Amazon, and I have bought more than a few. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stella J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful boots but I have a similar color and with socks they were uncomfortable. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Barbarellajean

customer_reviews.title: Snug on calves but will stretch. When they do ...
customer_reviews.text: Snug on calves but will stretch. When they do, they'll become slouchy. this is my 2 nd pair. Also, heal doesn't hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Germak

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were very slouchy in the ankles. Sent them back,
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Sheahan

customer_reviews.title: was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the boot. searched for lucky boots wide calf and this boot was not wide calf. was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Drawn by the leather, but cheap material used for the heel and sole.
customer_reviews.text: This was almost the perfect boot. The leather is nice, but you notice the pebbling on the leather. The material for the heel and sole leaves more to be desired. The best way for me to describe it is that it's not a stacked wooden heal, nor a rubber sole. It's a stiff plastic. This pair is NOT worth the nearly $200 I paid for it. The man-made, synthetic portion does not support the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: N.M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good leather boot with no buckles and few embellishments. After shopping through pages and pages of boots, I found this boot and thought I had found the "one." The boot is really pretty, but unfortunately, for me, my foot would not fit into boot. I have a slender frame and small calves, but my foot would just not fit . I tired putting it on with knee socks to make my foot slide easier, but I could not push my foot into bottom of boot. I am returning boot. So glad many others had more success with boot than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Freada Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foot and toe room but they did singe at ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots after reading the reviews. When they arrived I was so excited to try them on and they were very snug in the calf. Perfect foot and toe room but they did singe at the ankle. Which I hate. They were a great quality boot but a huge let down for me. Hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: that doesn't look like a pirate boot (because most flat black boots do)
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a riding boot that isn't bedazzled and buckled for a long time, just classic and timeless, that doesn't look like a pirate boot (because most flat black boots do). These are the perfect boot, BUT if you are wanting to buy them, size down, they fit about a half size big. they also are a little sloppy in the ankle. I wouldn't be wearing these with dresses but they definitely look cute with fall sweaters and blazers. because of the big size and the really wide calf/ankle I have to knock of a star. otherwise they are decent boots, especially for the price. For reference I have 13.5 inch calves.
customer_reviews.author: bootaddict

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Lucky brand are My Favorite, great durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ruby

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these boots but I am also really upset because ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these boots but I am also really upset because these boots are wide calf. No where in the desciption are they described as wide calf. Other than that I really wanted to keep the boots but am disappointed that they were not accurately descibed. They are being returned. Feel like I just wasted time & money.
customer_reviews.author: nicole  c. ransom

customer_reviews.title: Half size down from normal was still roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boots. Holding up well so far. They even look great after a few rainy days. I did have to return my first pair because it was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: BoogieJones

customer_reviews.title: Ok boots
customer_reviews.text: Overall I didn't like these boots all so much and I returned them. First, the size 8.5 was a little tight, and I normally wear 8.5, sometimes 9 in winter boots and I guess these would be one of them. Another thing I didn't like much was that the shaft only reaches just above mid-calf, and I was looking for taller ones. Lastly, I didn't much like the overall bulky style, they are pretty heavy and not very sleek. Pros are that the leather is really nice, I like the shape and style of the shaft, mid way between classy and cowboy, and they would have been very comfortable if they'd fit. I could tell the sole is soft.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect riding boots
customer_reviews.text: The perfect riding boots. The color is the trendiest thing in the planet. The leather is a+ quality. They are as Confy as they can be
customer_reviews.author: confesionestalkshow

product_meta.title: Lucky Brand Women's Hibiscus
product_meta.description: Rooted in rock 'n' roll with a signature sense of humor, Lucky Brand stands for independent thinking, individual style and a feeling as authentic as love. Friends since youth, creators Gene Montesano and Barry Perlman shipped the first order of Lucky Brand in 1990, and have been renowned for their great-fitting jeans and vintage-inspired apparel and accessories ever since.
feature_bullets: Riding boot in pebbled leather featuring full-length vertical overlays topped with pull-tabs and chunky stacked heel
